executiveSummary: Entrepreneur Cesa presented the Shower Toga, a portable shower and changing garment, seeking $80,000 for 33% equity. After demonstrating its use and defending it against comparisons to garbage bags, she impressed the Sharks with her passion, sales history, and personal story. Mark Cuban and Alli Webb jointly offered $80,000 for 40% equity, which Cesa accepted.
keyDecisions: Deal made with Mark Cuban and Alli Webb for $80,000 in exchange for 40% equity in Shower Toga.

actionItems.task: Finalize partnership and investment agreement with Mark Cuban and Alli Webb.
Reassess product naming for improved online visibility.

nextSteps: Cesa will work with Mark Cuban and Alli Webb to grow the Shower Toga brand, potentially rebranding for online clarity and scaling production and sales through new channels.
